context: Figma, Inc. is a collaborative design platform focused on UI/UX design, prototyping, and design systems in the browser. Leading design platform. AI design features. Competing with Adobe.

competitors.name: Adobe Creative Cloud
competitors.notes: Adobe's design suite with Firefly AI and integrated workflows

competitors.name: Canva
competitors.notes: Design platform now valued at $26B competing in visual design across segments

competitors.name: Framer
competitors.notes: AI-powered design and website builder with strong product velocity

competitors.name: Webflow
competitors.notes: Visual development platform competing in design-to-production

competitors.name: Miro
competitors.notes: Collaboration platform competing with FigJam for whiteboarding

competitors.name: Penpot
competitors.notes: Open-source design alternative gaining enterprise adoption

competitors.name: Sketch
competitors.notes: Mac design tool with reduced market presence

competitors.name: Zeplin
competitors.notes: Design handoff competing with Figma Dev Mode
